Add additional security to your account: Add additional security to your account using two factor authentication.
Add item to the list by search or scan b: Add item to the list by search or scan barcode
A new verification link has been sent to: Un nouveau lien de vérification a été envoyé à l'adresse e-mail que vous avez fournie lors de l'inscription.
Are you sure you want to delete the phot: Êtes-vous sûr de vouloir supprimer la photo ?
Are you sure you want to delete the reco: Are you sure you want to delete the record?
Are you sure you want to delete the record permanently?
Are you sure you want to delete your acc: Êtes-vous sûr de vouloir supprimer votre compte ? Une fois votre compte supprimé, toutes ses ressources et données seront définitivement supprimées. Veuillez saisir votre mot de passe pour confirmer que vous souhaitez supprimer définitivement votre compte.
Are you sure you want to restore the rec: Are you sure you want to restore the record?
Auto email (adjustments, check ins, chec: E-mail automatique (ajustements, vérification des inscriptions, vérification et transferts)
base_unit is the code of the base unit.
L'adresse e-mail du contact n'est pas définie.
Ensure your account is using a long, ran: Ensure your account is using a long, random password to stay secure.
Excel file should have code, name, phone: Excel file should have code, name, phone, email, address & active columns.
Excel file should have name, code & pare: Excel file should have name, code & parent columns.
Excel file should have name, code, base_: Excel file should have name, code, base_unit, operator & operation_value columns.
Excel file should have name, code, photo: Le fichier Excel doit avoir les colonnes nom, code, photo, sku, symbologie, unité, catégories, détails, has_serial, track_weight, track_quantity, alert_quantity, has_variants et variantes.
Excel file should have name, code, sku,: Excel file should have name, code, sku, symbology, unit, categories, details, has_serial, track_weight, track_quantity, alert_quantity, has_variants & variants columns.
Excel file should have name, phone, emai: Excel file should have name, phone, email & details columns.
Forgot your password?: Vous avez oublié votre mot de passe?
Forgot your password? No problem. Just l: Forgot your password? No problem. Just let us know your email address and we will email you a password reset link that will allow you to choose a new one.
has_serial, track_weight, track_quantity: has_serial, track_weight, track_quantity & has_variants are booleans and should have `yes` value to enable.
If necessary, you may log out of all of: If necessary, you may log out of all of your other browser sessions across all of your devices. Some of your recent sessions are listed below; however, this list may not be exhaustive. If you feel your account has been compromised, you should also update your password.
La langue n'est pas encore disponible.
Manage and log out your active sessions: Manage and log out your active sessions on other browsers and devices.
Modifying variants after you have stock: Modifier des variantes une fois que vous avez du stock pourrait entraîner un stock erroné.
Name: Nom
name along email or phone are required.
Aucune correspondance trouvée pour la variante de l'article.
Number, Currency and Date Format: Format de nombre, de devise et de date
Once deleted, all of its resources and d: Once deleted, all of its resources and data will be permanently deleted.
Once your account is deleted, all of its: Une fois votre compte supprimé, toutes ses ressources et données seront définitivement supprimées. Avant de supprimer votre compte, veuillez télécharger toutes les données ou informations que vous souhaitez conserver.
parent is the code of the parent categor: parent is the code of the parent category.
Photo is the image name with extension r: Photo est le nom de l'image avec l'extension relative à `public/assets/items/`

Store these recovery codes in a secure p: Store these recovery codes in a secure password manager. They can be used to recover access to your account if your two factor authentication device is lost.
Super Admin role can not be modified.
Thanks for signing up! Before getting st: Merci de vous inscrire! Avant de commencer, pourriez-vous vérifier votre adresse e-mail en cliquant sur le lien que nous venons de vous envoyer un e-mail? Si vous n'avez pas reçu l'e-mail, nous vous en enverrons un autre.
The locale length should be 2 or 5 chara: La longueur des paramètres régionaux doit être de 2 ou 5 caractères, par ex. en ou en-US.
The provided password does not match you: Le mot de passe fourni ne correspond pas à votre mot de passe actuel.
The record can not be deleted.
There is no data to display.
This is a secure area of the application: Il s'agit d'une zone sécurisée de l'application. Veuillez confirmer votre mot de passe avant de continuer.
This is computer generated document, no: This is computer generated document, no signature required.
This record is still a draft.

Two factor authentication is enabled. Sc: Two factor authentication is enabled. Scan the following QR code using your phone's authenticator application.
Unit and categories should be unit\/cate: Unit and categories should be unit/category code and already added to the system before importing items.
Update the record by modifying the detai: Update the record by modifying the details in the form below

Update your account's profile informatio: Update your account's profile information and email address.
L'utilisateur a réinitialisé le mot de passe.
L'utilisateur a mis à jour son mot de passe.
L'utilisateur a mis à jour son profil.
Variants should be separated by pipe `|`: Variants should be separated by pipe `|` as [Variant Name=Options(separated by comma)] e.g. Color=Red,Green|Size:S,M,L
When two factor authentication is enable: When two factor authentication is enabled, you will be prompted for a secure, random token during authentication. You may retrieve this token from your phone's Google Authenticator application.
Whoops, something went wrong on our serv: Oups, quelque chose s'est mal passé sur nos serveurs.
You have enabled two factor authenticati: You have enabled two factor authentication.
You have not enabled two factor authenti: You have not enabled two factor authentication.
You must fill the name & code columns al: You must fill the name & code columns along with active as `yes` or `no`
You must fill the name, code and categor: You must fill the name, code and categories columns.
You must fill the name and code columns.
You must fill the phone or email column: You must fill the phone or email column along with name.
You should not delete your own account.
Vous ne devez pas mettre à jour votre propre compte.
